document_data.caption: A map showing Sorynth's Silverware outlined in red.
document_data.name: Sorynth's Silverware
document_data.mainbody: '''Sorynth's Silverware''' was a shop located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location: Sorynth's Silverware was located in the north section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] on west side of the [[Street of the Sword]]. The rear of the shop faced [[Elsambul's Lane]].
